it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.model.card.CardFront
public class CardFront extends Object
This class represents the front side of card;

  • Method Details

    • checkCorner

      public boolean checkCorner(int corner)
      Check if it's possible to place a card on the corner indicated by the parameter Corner
      Parameters:
      corner - corner to be checked
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to place a card on that corner, false otherwise

    • coverCorner

      public Resources coverCorner(int corner)
      Sets the corner to hidden because a card covering it has been placed
      Parameters:
      corner - The index (0 to 3) of the corner to be covered.
      Returns:
      The type of resource that has been covered.

    • getResources

      public List<Resources> getResources()
      Returns a list of non-hidden and non-empty resources available in the card back.
      Returns:
      a list of Resources objects representing the available resources

    • getRequirements

      public Map<Resources,Integer> getRequirements()
      Retrieves the requirements of the card.
      Returns:
      A map of Resources and their required quantity.

    • getObjective

      public Objective getObjective()
      Retrieves the objective associated with the card.
      Returns:
      The objective of the card.

    • getImage

      public String getImage()
      Retrieves the path of the image associated with the back side of the card.
      Returns:
      The path of the image.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Retrieves the score of the card if the objective is satisfied.
      Returns:
      The score of the card.

    • getCorners

      public List<Resources> getCorners()
      Retrieves the list of resources representing the corners of the card.
      Returns:
